about_the_game:
"In the aftermath of a global war between humans and machines, you are the only hope of destroying an A.I. keeping what's left of mankind enslaved in a virtual world called Veris"



Veriscape is a 2D side-scroller/rhythm game where the stages are generated using music. Players will have to react fast as the music gets more intense

The main key to play the game is timing your jumps while keeping the pace, so that the multiverse death region won't catch you

The Controls Are Simple


AD/Left and Right Arrow Keys to Move
Space bar to Jump/double Jump/triple Jump

Lore


The idea behind this game started with a Game Jam about afterlife. It ended up not being submitted to that event, and it morphed into something different. I think it is a really fun game to play, and I hope you enjoy it as much as I did making it



We are planning on adding new stages if people like the game
